name: Monster Girl Clicker
description:
Delve into the Mine with (for now) one of ten Monster Girls! 

Mine four types of currencies to buy Pickaxe Upgrades and Autoclickers!

Each Monster Girl will have a unique ability to spice up the gameplay! 

(Oni - Short damage multiplier) 

NOT IN THE GAME YET:

------------------------------------------------

(Golem - Speed up all Autoclickers)

(Jiang Shi - Click to the beat of her hops for stacking damage) 

Buy upgrades for the monster girls, including alternate outfits and unlock cutscenes / dialogue with them. 

CONTROLS:

----------------------

Left click the rocks to mine 4 types of currency

Left Click the Monster Girl (Oni for now) to activate ability

F4 to fullscreen game 

Purchase Upgrades and Autoclickers in the Shop 

Find Red Ores in Depth 1

Find Green Ores in Depth 2

Find Blue Ores in Depth 3

Thanks for playing! Made for My First Game Jam Winter 2023
